fields.summary: BlackBerry: Kitchen Sink, imported from Studio Samples crashes on launch

fields.description:
h5. To reproduce 
1. Download ZIP
https://github.com/appcelerator/KitchenSink/tree/master
2. Import and install it onto BB device
3. Launch the app

h5. Actual result
App crashes

h5. Expected result
No crash
fields.summary: BlackBerry: KitchenSink  app crashes on launch error enabling Appcelerator services during app creation
fields.environment:
